---
title: The AIM Group
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: the_aim_group
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $40.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with The AIM Group. The average
  contract duration was 1.19 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $596.2K. The longest
  contract was 6.47 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $19.5M.
lookup_name: 'THE AIM GROUP'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '40.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '542'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '216'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '40%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '165%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.99'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '54.5M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.19'
s421_mean_contract_value: '596.2K'
s425_max_duration: '6.47'
s422_max_contract_value: '19.5M'
---
